chapter.title: Database Service command-line client
chapter.para: The trove client is the command-line interface (CLI) for the Database API and its extensions. This chapter documents trove version 1.0.5.
For help on a specific trove command, enter:

listitem.para: Lists available backups for an instance.
Attaches a configuration group to an instance.
Shows the default configuration of an instance.
Detaches a configuration group from an instance.
Lists all instances associated with a configuration group.
Lists available parameters for a configuration group.
Shows details of a configuration parameter.
Shows details of a configuration group.
Creates a database on an instance.
Lists available databases on an instance.
Lists available versions for a datastore.
Shows details of a datastore version.
Lists the limits for a tenant.
Resizes the flavor of an instance.
Resizes the volume size of an instance.
Gets root enabled status for a instance.
Shows details about a security group.
Deletes a user from the instance.
Grants access to a database(s) for a user.
Lists the users for a instance.
Revokes access to a database for a user.
Gets a user from the instance.
Gets a users access from the instance.
Updates a users attributes from the instance.
Displays help about this program or one of its subcommands.
show program's version number and exit
Defaults to database for most actions.
Specify a CA bundle file to use in verifying a TLS (https) server certificate. Defaults to env[OS_CACERT].
Output json instead of prettyprint. Defaults to env[OS_JSON_OUTPUT].

section.title: trove backup-create command
section.para: Creates a backup.

listitem.para: An optional description for the backup.
Optional UUID of the parent backup to perform an incremental backup from.

section.title: trove backup-delete command
section.para: Deletes a backup.

section.title: trove backup-list command
section.para: Lists available backups.

listitem.para: Return up to N number of the most recent backups.

section.title: trove backup-list-instance command
section.para: Lists available backups for an instance.

listitem.para: Return up to N number of the most recent backups.

section.title: trove backup-show command
section.para: Shows details of a backup.

section.title: trove configuration-attach command
section.para: Attaches a configuration group to an instance.

listitem.para: UUID of the configuration group to attach to the instance.

section.title: trove configuration-create command
section.para: Creates a configuration group.

listitem.para: Dictionary of the values to set.
Datastore assigned to the configuration group.
Datastore version UUID assigned to the configuration group.
An optional description for the configuration group.

section.title: trove configuration-default command
section.para: Shows the default configuration of an instance.

section.title: trove configuration-delete command
section.para: Deletes a configuration group.

section.title: trove configuration-detach command
section.para: Detaches a configuration group from an instance.

section.title: trove configuration-instances command
section.para: Lists all instances associated with a configuration group.

section.title: trove configuration-list command
section.para: Lists all configuration groups.

section.title: trove configuration-parameter-list command
section.para: Lists available parameters for a configuration group.

listitem.para: Datastore version name or UUID assigned to the configuration group.
UUID or name of the datastore to list configuration parameters for. Optional if UUID of the datastore_version is provided.

section.title: trove configuration-parameter-show command
section.para: Shows details of a configuration parameter.

listitem.para: Datastore version name or UUID assigned to the configuration group.
UUID or name of the datastore to list configuration parameters for. Optional if UUID of the datastore_version is provided.

section.title: trove configuration-patch command
section.para: Patches a configuration group.

listitem.para: Dictionary of the values to set.

section.title: trove configuration-show command
section.para: Shows details of a configuration group.

section.title: trove configuration-update command
section.para: Updates a configuration group.

listitem.para: Dictionary of the values to set.
An optional description for the configuration group.

section.title: trove create command
section.para: Creates a new instance.

listitem.para: Size of the instance disk in GB.
Optional list of users in the form user:password.
The Zone hint to give to nova.
A datastore version name or UUID.

Create a NIC on the instance. Specify option multiple times to create multiple NICs. net-id: attach NIC to network with this UUID (required, if no port-id specified), v4-fixed-ip: IPv4 fixed address for NIC (optional), port-id: attach NIC to port with this UUID (required, if no net-id specified).
UUID of the configuration group to attach to the instance.

section.title: trove database-create command
section.para: Creates a database on an instance.

section.title: trove database-delete command
section.para: Deletes a database.

section.title: trove database-list command
section.para: Lists available databases on an instance.

section.title: trove datastore-list command
section.para: Lists available datastores.

section.title: trove datastore-show command
section.para: Shows details of a datastore.

section.title: trove datastore-version-list command
section.para: Lists available versions for a datastore.

section.title: trove datastore-version-show command
section.para: Shows details of a datastore version.

listitem.para: ID or name of the datastore. Optional if UUID of the datastore_version is provided.

section.title: trove delete command
section.para: Deletes an instance.

section.title: trove flavor-list command
section.para: Lists available flavors.

section.title: trove flavor-show command
section.para: Shows details of a flavor.

section.title: trove limit-list command
section.para: Lists the limits for a tenant.

section.title: trove list command
section.para: Lists all the instances.

section.title: trove resize-flavor command
section.para: Resizes the flavor of an instance.

section.title: trove resize-volume command
section.para: Resizes the volume size of an instance.

listitem.para: Size of the instance disk in GB.

section.title: trove restart command
section.para: Restarts the instance.

section.title: trove root-enable command
section.para: Enables root for a instance.

section.title: trove root-show command
section.para: Gets root enabled status for a instance.

section.title: trove secgroup-add-rule command
section.para: Creates a security group rule.

section.title: trove secgroup-delete-rule command
section.para: Deletes a security group rule.

section.title: trove secgroup-list command
section.para: Lists all security groups.

section.title: trove secgroup-show command
section.para: Shows details about a security group.

section.title: trove show command
section.para: Shows details of an instance.

section.title: trove user-create command
section.para: Creates a user.

section.title: trove user-delete command
section.para: Deletes a user from the instance.

section.title: trove user-grant-access command
section.para: Grants access to a database(s) for a user.

section.title: trove user-list command
section.para: Lists the users for a instance.

section.title: trove user-revoke-access command
section.para: Revokes access to a database for a user.

section.title: trove user-show command
section.para: Gets a user from the instance.

section.title: trove user-show-access command
section.para: Gets a users access from the instance.

section.title: trove user-update-attributes command
section.para: Updates a users attributes from the instance.
